description: The design of their Mansfield Shirt is simple; a single button pocket and button-down collar made of lightweight and breathable cotton-poly fabric. But, to separate you from the plaid adorned masses, we make the Mansfield a platform for unique patterns and designs. Features include the Howler signature sunglass cleaning microfiber at the right hem and Howler Monkey icon logo seam tag.
name: Howler Bros Mansfield Shirt - Mens
